how_b5d8e7.label: How do you currently generate new sales leads or opportunities?

options.no_consistent_method: We don't have a consistent method

options.key_steps: We have a few key steps we try to follow
options.defined_process: Yes - we use a defined process from lead to close

how_fee95e.label: How do you currently track your sales pipeline?

options.structured_system: In a structured system with deal stages and forecasts

options.automated_followup: We have automated or scheduled follow ups

options.basic_questions: We ask a few questions during discovery

options.scoring_framework: We follow a lead scoring or qualification framework

how_142ca2.label: How would you describe your current approach to proposals or pricing?

options.routed_by_criteria: Leads are routed based on role, territory, or fit

options.forecast_data: Very confident - we forecast based on deal data

how_47b050.label: How often do you review your sales pipeline or forecast?

options.gut_feel: Very informal, we go with gut feel

how_7d8dcb.label: How confident are you in the accuracy of your current pipeline data?

options.scoring_criteria: We use scoring or qualification criteria
